Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.commandHandler.synchronous

Class CommandHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.commandHandler.synchronous.CommandHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
AskForControlHandler, ChooseAssistantHandler, ChooseCloudHandler, ConnectionRequestHandler, DeselectStudentHandler, EndTurnHandler, GetGameInitializationStatus, GetLobbyStatusHandler, MoveMNToIslandHandler, PlayCharacterHandler, PlayGameHandler, PutInHallHandler, PutInIslandHandler, QuitGameHandler, RequestLeaveLobbyHandler, SelectCharacterHandler, SelectEntranceStudentHandler, SelectEntranceStudentsHandler, SelectIslandGroupHandler, SelectStudentColorHandler, SelectStudentOnCardHandler, SelectTowerColorHandler, SelectWizardHandler, SendNotReadyHandler, SendReadyHandler, StartGameHandler
public abstract class CommandHandler extends Object
This class is to be extended by handlers of a single network command Each handler deals with one command, which must be assigned in the constructor

  • Method Details

    • executeCommand

      public abstract boolean executeCommand(MessageBroker messageBroker, ClientHandlerParameters parameters) throws UnexecutableCommandException
      Processes the command stored inside the given messageBroker if it's responsibility of the specific class and replies to the Client
      Parameters:
      messageBroker - The broker containing the message to execute
      parameters - The clientHandler parameters containing all the fields the command is allowed to see and edit
      Returns:
      true if the operation was successful. false if an occurred error should be brought to the attention of the server
      Throws:
      UnexecutableCommandException - If the command is not this class' responsibility

    • parseCommand

      public CommandEnum parseCommand(Object command)
      Returns the command enum value of the given object, if it's a variable
      Parameters:
      command - the object to cast
      Returns:
      the CommandEnum equivalent of the object input

    • notifySuccessfulOperation

      protected void notifySuccessfulOperation(MessageBroker messageBroker)
      Adds the reply fields in the server message in case of a successful operation (Message and status)
      Parameters:
      messageBroker - The messageBroker which will contain the successful operation response

    • notifyError

      protected void notifyError(MessageBroker messageBroker, String errorMessage)
      Adds the reply fields in the server message in case of a failed operation (Message and status)
      Parameters:
      messageBroker - The messageBroker which will contain the failed operation response
      errorMessage - A verbose message describing the error

    • checkHandleable

      public boolean checkHandleable(CommandEnum read, CommandEnum required)
      Checks whether the command can be handled by the handler calling the function
      Parameters:
      read - the command read
      required - the command that the handler can handle
      Returns:
      true if the command can be handled correctly

    • getCommandAccepted

      public CommandEnum getCommandAccepted()
